name: 03_Text_Classification_NaiveBayes_20Newsgroups_ML
query: Implement a Naive Bayes classifier in `src/model.py` for 20 Newsgroups. Load the dataset in `src/data_loader.py` with preprocessing (remove stop words, punctuation, special characters) and TF-IDF features. Save word clouds to `results/figures/wordcloud_before.png` and `results/figures/wordcloud_after.png`. Save performance report with precision, recall, and F1-score to `results/metrics/performance.txt`.

requirements.criteria: The "20 Newsgroups" dataset is used in `src/data_loader.py`.

Data preprocessing is performed, including removing stop words, punctuation, and special characters. Word clouds are visualized before and after training the classifier, and saved as `results/figures/wordcloud_before.png` and `results/figures/wordcloud_after.png`.
"TF-IDF" features are used when loading the data in `src/data_loader.py`.
A "Naive Bayes classifier" is implemented in `src/model.py`.
A performance report, including "precision," "recall," and the "F1-score," is printed and saved as `results/metrics/performance.txt`.

preferences.criteria: The model should be straightforward to interpret.
The final report should be structured clearly for easy review.
